title: Is We Dumb? | Island. Bill. Flip Phone. Flock of Zebras.
description:
How would one go about chasing down a bunch of Zebras to suck their dongs in order to secure 5G coverage everywhere forever? Let's talk about that, your son making you look like a piece of s**t dad in public, a motel that apparently needs to fire everyone, being worried an island will literally flip over, and more on today's episode of Is We Dumb?!

New episodes every Wednesday at 12pm PST

Watch this episode on YouTube: https://youtu.be/1IFLB1DyuKw
